trans-unit.source: Represents the abstract base class from which all classes that derive byte sequences of a specified length inherit.
trans-unit.target: 表示衍生指定長度的位元組序列所有類別所都繼承的抽象基底類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DeriveBytes"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DeriveBytes"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, releases all resources used by the current instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DeriveBytes"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫，釋出目前的執行個體所使用的所有資源<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DeriveBytes"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DeriveBytes>.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫`Dispose`當您完成使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DeriveBytes>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DeriveBytes>

trans-unit.source: The `Dispose` method leaves the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DeriveBytes> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose`方法會使<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DeriveBytes>中無法使用的狀態。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DeriveBytes>

trans-unit.source: After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DeriveBytes> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DeriveBytes> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫`Dispose`，您必須釋放所有參考<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DeriveBytes>讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體的<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DeriveBytes>所佔用。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DeriveBytes> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DeriveBytes>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[實作 Dispose 方法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DeriveBytes>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 永遠呼叫`Dispose`釋放您的最後一個參考至<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DeriveBytes>。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DeriveBytes>之前

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DeriveBytes> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它所使用的資源將不會釋放直到記憶體回收行程呼叫<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DeriveBytes>物件的`Finalize`方法。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DeriveBytes>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DeriveBytes"></xref> class and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，釋放所使用的 unmanaged 的資源<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DeriveBytes"></xref>類別，並選擇性釋放 managed 的資源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和`Finalize`方法。

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: `Finalize` invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: `Finalize`叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DeriveBytes> references.
trans-unit.target: 當`disposing`參數是`true`，這個方法的任何 managed 物件所持有的資源全部釋出這個<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DeriveBytes>參考。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DeriveBytes>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會叫用`Dispose()`每個參考物件的方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示釋放 managed 和 unmanaged 資源，<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>表示只釋放 unmanaged 的資源。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns pseudo-random key bytes.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，會傳回虛擬隨機金鑰位元組。

trans-unit.source: The number of pseudo-random key bytes to generate.
trans-unit.target: 若要產生的似隨機金鑰位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: A byte array filled with pseudo-random key bytes.
trans-unit.target: 位元組陣列，以虛擬隨機金鑰位元組填入。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, resets the state of the operation.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，會重設作業的狀態。
